catalog_info.title: Differential Geometry
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Knowlledge of the material in Mathematics 132 and 136.
catalog_info.description: Smooth manifolds (vector fields, differential forms, and their algebraic structures; Frobenius theorem), Riemannian geometry (metrics, connections, curvatures, geodesics, flatness, and manifolds of constant curvature), symplectic geometry, Lie groups, principal bundles.
